Articles.Content: what are some good online resources for learning c#? I know a good amount about programming so anything thats a bit technical is fine by me.

I haven't a tut or so to offer..

but

http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/

is ofcourse allways in my serps

Also

http://www.dotnetperls.com

is delivered by google reguarly if I search something

hth
If you google "learn C#" or "C# tutorials" you should find a bunch.

I learned by looking at source from other mods, plenty of googling (mostly ending up on the Unity3D forums) and the Unity tutorial videos, which are superb. Visual Studio is pretty helpful once you've got the references set up.

Plenty of help here too; loads of people have been extremely kind and patient pointing me in the right direction.
